properties.youtube:title: The Plockton Brewery Opening - part
properties.notes: the API could not map out the accurate adress: 5 Bank St Plockton, Rossshire IV52 8TP, UK
properties.description: Started producing cask-conditioned ale on 1st April 2007. Three ales are brewed, Crag;s Ale (4.3%), Starboard IPA (5.1%), and Dall Winter Sunshine (4.8%). Beers are available locally.
properties.title: Plockton Brewery

properties.description: Started brewing in March 2007, using a five barrel plant. Three core beers are brewed - Colonsay Lager (4.4 %), Colonsay 80/- Ale (4.2%), and Colonsay IPA (3.9%). Beers are available in bottles only.
properties.title: Isle of Colonsay Brewing Company

properties.description: Using a 4 barrel brewery, commissioned in September 2006. Their first beer is a malty, reasonably bitter, brown ale which is being refined by experimenting with various quantities/types of aromatic hops in an effort to achieve a distinctive identity.
properties.title: Glenfinnan Brewery

properties.description: Started brewing at the beginning of May 2005 with a 5 barrel plant behind MacGochans Bar in Tobermory. Beers include McCaig's Folly and Galleon Gold. There are plans to move to a custom-built brewery, also in Tobermory.
properties.address: Macgochans, Tobermory, Isle of Mull, Isle Of Mull PA75 6PD, United Kingdom
properties.title: Isle of Mull Brewery

properties.description: First beers were produced in late 2004 at Moorhouses (in Lancashire). The brewery is located in the old Swannay cheese factory at Birsay, on Mainland Orkney. Currently brewing with a small plant, but will be installing larger equipment from the Guernsey Brewery. Ales include Dark Munro, Scapa Special and Orkney Best.
properties.title: Highland Brewing Company

properties.description: Born in September 2004, in the old public bar of the Sligachan Hotel. Celebration ales brewed, regular brewing planned from Easter 2005. Ales brewed for sale in Sligachan Hotel.
properties.address: Sligachan, Carbost, Isle Of Skye IV47 8SW, UK
properties.title: Cuillin Brewery Ltd

properties.description: Established in an old Tractor Shed in Bridgend, in March 2004. Ales include Finlaggan and Blackrock.
properties.address: Islay House Square Bridgend Isle of Islay Argyll PA44 7NZ
properties.title: Islay Ales Co Ltd

properties.description: Brewing moved to the family croft at Camusnagaul, near Dundonnell, during March 2003. Ales include An Teallach and Beinn Dearg.
properties.title: An Teallach Brewery

properties.description: Brewing in one of the old Aluminium Smelter buildings at Kinlochleven since February 2002. Ales include Latitude and Wayfarer.
properties.title: Atlas Brewery

properties.description: Based in Stornoway in the Outer Hebrides. Started brewing in January 2002 and now produce five regular and some seasonal ales. Beers include Seaforth Ale @ 4.2%, Clansman Ale @ 3.9% (the first ale ever brewed in Stornoway), Celtic Black @ 3.9%, Islander Strong Ale @ 4.8% and Berserker Export Pale Ale @ 7.5%.
properties.address: 18A Bells Road, Stornoway, Isle Of Lewis HS1 2RA, United Kingdom
properties.title: Hebridean Brewing Company

properties.youtube:title: Cairngorm Brewery - The Drinking Man's Guide To Scotland
properties.description: Set up in late 2001 to market the beers of the Tomintoul and Aviemore breweries, which they own. Ales include Wildcat, Stag, Highland IPA and Trade Winds. Seasonal ales are brewed.
properties.address: Dalfaber Industrial Estate Aviemore, Inverness-shire PH22 1ST United Kingdom
properties.title: Cairngorm Brewery Company

properties.description: Based at the head of Loch Fyne, brewing started on St Andrew's Day 2001. Ales include Piper’s Gold and Maverick. All bottled beers are bottle-conditioned.
properties.title: Fyne Ales Brewery

properties.youtube:title: The Arran Brewery - The Drinking Man's Guide To Scotland
properties.description: Located close to Brodick Castle. Opened late March 2000. Ales include Blond and Dark. Arran Brewing Company has called in the administrators after running into cashflow problems. Graham Martin and Laurie Manson of PricewaterhouseCoopers were appointed as joint administrators to the company early in May 2008.
properties.address: Cladach, Brodick, Isle of Arran, Scotland, KA27 8DE
properties.title: Isle of Arran Brewery

properties.youtube:title: Black Isle Brewery Shindig 2011
properties.description: Started brewing in December 1998 in converted farm buildings. Ales include Red Kite and Yellowhammer. Organic ales are a speciality.
properties.address: Old Allangrange, Munlochy, Ross-shire, IV8 8NZ, SCOTLAND
properties.title: Black Isle Brewery

properties.description: The most northerly brewery in the UK started brewing on the island of Unst in December 1997. Ales include White Wife.
properties.address: Baltasound, Unst, Shetland, Shetland Islands ZE2, UK
properties.title: Valhalla Brewery

properties.description: Based in Uig by the Western Isles ferry terminal. Brewing since December 1995. Ales include Red & Black Cuillin and Blaven. Seasonal, House, and special event ales are brewed.
properties.address: Uig, Isle of Skye, United Kingdom
properties.title: Isle of Skye Brewery

properties.youtube:title: Presentation of beer award
properties.description: Brewing commenced in March 1988 at the old schoolhouse in Sandwick. Ales include Dark Island and Red MacGregor.
properties.name: XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
properties.title: Orkney Brewery
